Package Yuconz.controller

Class AppController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Yuconz.controller.AppController
  • public class AppController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the App Controller, essentially the main class for the Application that brings everything together. The frames are created from here, and the main method is here as well.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Launch the application.

      • logIn

        public static void logIn​(java.lang.String uName,
                         java.lang.String pwd,
                         boolean revChecked)
        Authenticates & Authorises the login and checks if the user is valid in the database. Then proceeds to Log the Authentication and Authorisation. Directs the User to the Employee Main Display Frame (Essentially a Portal).
        Parameters:
        uName - username
        pwd - password

      • reviewMenu

        public static void reviewMenu()
        Authenticates & Authorises the login and checks if the user is valid in the database. Then proceeds to Log the Authentication and Authorisation. Directs the User to the Reviewers Main Display Frame (Essentially a Portal).
        Parameters:
        uName -
        pwd -

      • toggleAuthorisation

        public static void toggleAuthorisation​(boolean input)
        Logs the new Authorisation via the Toggle into the Authorisation_Logs.txt file

      • logOut

        public static void logOut()
        Logs out the User and closes the System. We check if any of the frames have ever been opened since run time. If they have we dispose all of them. And run the main method again.

      • generatePd

        public static void generatePd()
        Generates Personal Details Frame and Populates the details in it, from the Database. detailsLookUp is the class that connects to the PersonalDetails Table in the Database.

      • showLookUp

        public static void showLookUp()
        Creates a Frame that shows all Current Employees in a table.

      • selectedDetails

        public static void selectedDetails()
        Creates a Frame for the selected user, that gives an overview of the selected User and actions that can be taken.

      • createDetails

        public static void createDetails()
        Creates a Frame that allows allows User to create Personal Details for another Employee

      • viewDetails

        public static void viewDetails()
        Creates a Frame that allows user to view other Employees Personal Details

      • insertMyDetails

        public static void insertMyDetails()
        Inserts new entry into PersonalDetails Table, by calling the method that handles that.
